BAD_FLAG_double - Static variable in class bartMachine.bartMachineTreeNode
a flag that represents an invalid double value
BAD_FLAG_int - Static variable in class bartMachine.bartMachineTreeNode
a flag that represents an invalid integer value
bart - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachineTreeNode
a link back to the overall bart model
bart_gibbs_chain_threads - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachineRegressionMultThread
the collection of num_cores BART models which will run separate Gibbs chains
bartMachine - package bartMachine
The code for the implementation of the BART algorithm as described in detail in:
bartMachine_a_base - Class in bartMachine
The base class for any BART implementation.
bartMachine_a_base() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachine_a_base
 
bartMachine_b_hyperparams - Class in bartMachine
This portion of the code controls hyperparameters for the BART algorithm as well as properties and transformations of the response variable.
bartMachine_b_hyperparams() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachine_b_hyperparams
 
bartMachine_c_debug - Class in bartMachine
This portion of the code used to have many debug functions.
bartMachine_c_debug() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachine_c_debug
 
bartMachine_d_init - Class in bartMachine
This portion of the code initializes the Gibbs sampler
bartMachine_d_init() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachine_d_init
 
bartMachine_e_gibbs_base - Class in bartMachine
This portion of the code performs everything in the Gibbs sampling except for the posterior sampling itself
bartMachine_e_gibbs_base() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachine_e_gibbs_base
 
bartMachine_f_gibbs_internal - Class in bartMachine
This portion of the code that performs the posterior sampling in the Gibbs sampler except for the Metropolis-Hastings tree search step
bartMachine_f_gibbs_internal() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachine_f_gibbs_internal
 
bartMachine_g_mh - Class in bartMachine
This portion of the code performs the Metropolis-Hastings tree search step
bartMachine_g_mh() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachine_g_mh
 
bartMachine_g_mh.Steps - Enum in bartMachine
the types of steps in the Metropolis-Hastings tree search
bartMachine_g_mh.Steps() - Constructor for enum bartMachine.bartMachine_g_mh.Steps
 
bartMachine_h_eval - Class in bartMachine
This portion of the code performs the evaluation / prediction on the BART model
bartMachine_h_eval() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachine_h_eval
 
bartMachine_i_prior_cov_spec - Class in bartMachine
This portion of the code implements the informed prior information on covariates feature.
bartMachine_i_prior_cov_spec() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachine_i_prior_cov_spec
 
bartMachineClassification - Class in bartMachine
The class that is instantiated to build a binary classification BART model
bartMachineClassification() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachineClassification
 
bartMachineClassificationMultThread - Class in bartMachine
This class handles the parallelization of many Gibbs chains over many CPU cores to create one BART regression model.
bartMachineClassificationMultThread() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachineClassificationMultThread
 
bartMachineRegression - Class in bartMachine
The class that is instantiated to build a Regression BART model
bartMachineRegression() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachineRegression
Constructs the BART classifier for regression.
bartMachineRegressionMultThread - Class in bartMachine
This class handles the parallelization of many Gibbs chains over many CPU cores to create one BART regression model.
bartMachineRegressionMultThread() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachineRegressionMultThread
the default constructor sets the number of total iterations each Gibbs chain is charged with sampling
bartMachineTreeNode - Class in bartMachine
The class that stores all the information in one node of the BART trees
bartMachineTreeNode() - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachineTreeNode
 
bartMachineTreeNode(bartMachineTreeNode, bartMachine_b_hyperparams) - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachineTreeNode
Creates a new node
bartMachineTreeNode(bartMachineTreeNode) - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachineTreeNode
Creates a new node
bartMachineTreeNode(bartMachine_b_hyperparams) - Constructor for class bartMachine.bartMachineTreeNode
Creates a new node
beta - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachine_b_hyperparams
A hyperparameter that controls how easy it is to grow new nodes in a tree dependent on depth which makes it more difficult as the tree gets deeper
beta - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachineRegressionMultThread
A hyperparameter that controls how easy it is to grow new nodes in a tree dependent on depth which makes it more difficult as the tree gets deeper
binary_add_arrays(int[], int[]) - Static method in class bartMachine.Tools
Adds one array to another after first converting each addend to binary (1 if the value > 0, 0 otherwise)
border_width - Static variable in class bartMachine.TreeIllustration
 
Build() - Method in class bartMachine.bartMachine_e_gibbs_base
Builds a BART model by unleashing the Gibbs sampler
Build() - Method in class bartMachine.bartMachineRegressionMultThread
This function actually initiates the Gibbs sampling to build all the BART models
Build() - Method in class bartMachine.Classifier
build the machine learning classifier (implemented by a daughter class), you must set the data first
BuildOnAllThreads() - Method in class bartMachine.bartMachineRegressionMultThread
This is the core of BART's parallelization for model creation: build one BART model on each CPU core in parallel
